item.title: Rumble Rallies After Unveiling Tether-Powered Crypto Wallet – Retail Expects Stock To Surpass The $10 Mark
item.description: The wallet, built with Tether’s Wallet Development Kit, currently supports Bitcoin, Tether (USDT), and Tether Gold (XAUt).
